summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5555 for the improvement of 35th Avenue West, from West Barrett Street to West Dravus Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 72035, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
